Key: It's so peaceful...

(The time is 8 PM. We cleaned up after
dinner, and those in charge of housework were
given a moment to rest.)

(I was doing nothing in particular, simply
lazing about while flipping through TV
channels.)

Time for some relaxation. Now then, any
interesting shows on?

(Just then, I perked up to the sound of a
familiar voice, and suddenly someone whom
I knew quite well appeared on-screen.)
Good evening, everyone!
Ohh, if it isn't Miku! She's on primetime TV!

(Miku had been working as an idol in secret,
almost like an anonymous celebrity, but ever
since we met, she gave the OK to show her face.)

Hmm. It's surreal to see her on TV... I almost
can't believe that she's my girlfriend.

(It's a dream come true to be dating an idol,
after all.)

But... that's why, even so, it's probably for
the best to keep our relationship a secret.

(It'd be terrible if there were ever a scandal.
Miku Izayoi is insanely popular, of course.)
Maybe I should really be more careful...

Wait, a visitor at this hour? I wonder who
it could be...
Yes, yes.
Daaaaarling!

M-Miku?! You're here, all of a sudden.
Wait, weren't you on TV?
Huh? TV? But my work's done for today?

(Oh, that's right. It's not a live program.
They must be playing a recording.)

I just saw you appear on my TV. More importantly,
what's the matter? You finished work and came
straight here?
Yup, that's riiiight. Please listen, darling.
A-All right.

Recently, my workload has ballooned. Goodness,
it's been difficult, working until the wee hours.
At this rate, I'll end up tired and wrinkled!

No, no. I don't think that would happen, but
it does sound like a lot of work. Well, maybe
being busy is a good thing for you, though.

It's not good at all! At this rate, my chances
to see you will keep shrinking, darling!
I'll end up with Darling Deficiency Disease!

Deficiency. Just because we haven't seen
each other in a couple days... Can't you survive
without me that long?
Not just"! For a girl who's hopelessly in love,

Operator: one day without her beloved is longer than

Key:
Isn't the saying only 1,000 years...? Well,
it makes me glad to hear you want to see me.
You came over after working all day, right?

Yes, once I made up my mind, I couldn't stop
myself.

I mean, that's flattering... I'm flattered, but
Miku-san? If your fans were to hear you
visited some guy at this hour of night...

Hmph. If they found out, then what? Are my
fans more important than me not being able
to see you?
N-No, never mind. Stay as long as you'd like.

(Ahh, I'm soft... I'm too soft, man.
But there's no use if she's already here.)

Yaaay! I got darling's seal of approval!
Then, tonight I'll be staying the night!

Th-That's no good! I mean, if it gets too
late, I'll take you home!
Aw, but I want to talk with you until morning.
Well, you know, Kotori's here too... Right?

I understand～. Then, let me stay the night
when Kotori-chan isn't around, okay?

(Urgh, I messed up... Now I'm about to put
my foot in my mouth.)

*sigh*... All right, I understand. I'll think
about it.

Yaaay, then I'll be content with the attention
you give me right now, darling.

Yeah, no problem. More importantly though,
let's not stand here talking forever. Come
inside. Aren't you freezing?
Yes. Pardon me, then.

Are you okay with my room? If you want
to rest, the living room has a sofa. I'm sure
it'll be comfortable enough?

No can do. It's a girlfriend's privilege to
enter her darling's room! I said that last time,
didn't I?
All right, then. Make yourself comfortable.
Yes, I'd love to. Hee hee hee, darling.

(Ugh. Miku's snuggling up to me. I might be
tired, but I find the flushed side of her face
sexy. And her lips look really soft.)
What are you looking at, darling?
Err, ah, no. N-Nowhere in particular...
Is that so? I felt your gaze～
I-I wasn't looking, I wasn't looking!
It's okay for you to do it...

(Do it?! Do what?! What is it okay for me
to do?!)
It'd be special with you, darling... Here.
Feeling comfortable, Miku?

Yes, I feel quite comfy on top of your lap,
darling.
Hahaha...

(Right now, Miku's laying her head on my lap.
I assume she's enjoying it as I stroke her hair.)
Ahh. How therapeutic.
I hear ya. Glad you like it.
(So this is what she meant by do it".

Operator: Well, my lap's open for her any time.)"

Key:
You really are the best, darling. All my
exhaustion from work is melting away.

You're always busy, after all. Well, if this
relaxes you at all, don't hesitate to tell me.
I'll do anything in my power to help.

Darling, what did you say just now～?
Do you mean you'll do anything for me～?

Uhh, w-well, that's just a saying. That's not
to say that I could do ANYTHING...

Hee hee hee. You'll do anything, anything for
me, right? Actually, there's a favor I wanted to
ask of you, darling.
A f-favor...?
Um. Is this sort of thing okay for your favor?
Yes. I wanted you to give me a massage, darling.

But if that's what you want, wouldn't it be
better to hire a masseuse...?

I wanted *you* to do it, darling. Besides,
I couldn't bear the thought of another man
besides you touching me.
W-Well, if that's the case...

(It can't be helped, right? This is how I found
myself giving Miku a massage, but...)
This feels really wrong.
Darling, hurry～...

Gaaah! Don't make it so weird, okay?!
All right, then. Please excuse me...
Aha, that tickles. Harder, darling...

(Even considering that, Miku's body is
incredibly soft. I feel like if apply too much
pressure, she'll break.)
A-All right... Kinda like this?

Aaaaah. No good at all. You have to press
harder.
Th-Then... Like this...!
Mmm, that's good. Just like that.

(Massage. This is a massage. Nothing suspicious
about this at all. Nothing indecent happening
here!)

Darling? No zoning out. You must hurry and
continue.

I-I know!
...Here we go.
...Aaaaaah.

(Gaaah. I can't do this. Touching Miku's soft
skin like this, and hearing her make those
noises, gets me feeling some kind of way.)

M-Miku, that should be enough, right?
I'm sure you're plenty relaxed now, right?

Aw, but we've only just begun. Darling,
do your best! ♪

Fine, all right. If I'm gonna do it, I'm doing it
until you're satisfied. Feeling stiff anywhere
else, madame?
Hm, a bit further down if you please.

Down? Guess near the waist...
Hm, hah.
How's that?
Mmm. Feels splendid～

All right, then. Around here...
Anywhere else?
Mmm, ooohh. A little more...
A little more in a different place?
Please touch, a little further down.

Further down... Where do you want me to
touch?! You saying further than your bottom?!
Around here?
A bit further... Like further downwards...

Right. A bit further down... Whoa! No no no no!
Just where are you leading my hands?!
Aww, too bad. Just a bit further...

What do you mean, a bit further...?
If you're done, I'm stopping now.

No, you can't. I want to flirt with you more,
darling.

Flirt... Wasn't this supposed to be a massage?
If you insist, I'll keep going. So, where else
would you like me to massage?
Hmm, I'll leave it to you.
Leave it to me...? This isn't a spa, you know.

Hee hee. Touch me anywhere you'd like,
darling.

(Ngh. She's totally teasing me. Then I'll be
extra thorough! If that were the case, I feel
like a choice screen should appear here...)
Aim for the feet.
Rub her shoulders.
Pretend to massage, then tickle her.
Then, I'll massage your feet.

My feet～? Might you have a foot fetish,
darling?

I-It's not like that. As an idol, you're always
on your feet with singing and dancing,
right? I thought your feet might be tired, too.

Hm. Is that so? It seemed like you had an
answer prepared, which isn't suspicious
at all.

Ugh. I'm not being suspicious at all.
Let's get on with it already. Otherwise,
I'm done for the day.

Goodness, guess it can't be helped.
Please go ahead.

(Miku slowly stuck out one foot. It looked just
as soft as her back.)
Hee hee, do with it as you please, okay?

Why?! It's true there are people who are like
that. At the very least, I'm not!

Hee hee. You don't have to be embarrassed.
If you wanted to, darling, then I'd let you.
Here, just be honest with yourself.

Now that you say, I'm starting to feel like I
have to—wait, wait! That isn't something I'm
into, I swear!

Come on, stop it with all the crazy talk.
I'm going to start, here!
Ack. Darling, that's—!

I'm doing a pressure point massage. It might
hurt a lot at first, but it relieves the tension,
don't you think?
Ah, hey, wait... Aaaah!

Oh, seems like this spot's pretty tense.
There!
Kyaaa! Darling, stop, be more gentle!
No can do. Come on, give me your other foot.

A-Any more... than this is...
I caaaaaan't!

(Afterwards, having thoroughly massaged
Miku's feet, despite looking exhausted,
she seemed quite relaxed. I hope it helped.)

All right, I'm going to massage your shoulders,
so please sit down.
A classic massage. Understood.

If your shoulders get too stiff, it can lead
to headaches. Massages are good, but it's
better to stretch every day.

Yeeees, I know. You're acting like my
manager, darling. Or maybe, a mother?

R-Right. First and foremost, your boyfriend...
Well, whatever. Just try to relax.
Very well... Ahh, that's great.

Okay, there we go. I'd like to massage around
your neck, but tying up your hair would be a
pain... Well, next time.
Yes, thank you. Whew, I somehow feel lighter.

Oh, that's right. Miku, don't move for just a
second.
...? Is there something else?
Yeah, just bear with me... Here.
Oooh, a scalp massage. I see.

Yeah, they say the head has a lot of pressure
points. They do this a lot at beauty parlors,
but it feels pretty good.
Indeed. That's quite nice. Please continue.

(She sure seems to be enjoying yourself.
I hear most people don't like having their heads
touched, so it's proof that she trusts me.)
(...I'm starting to feel a little deviant.)
All right, Miku. Sit still for me.
Okaaaay. I understaaaand.
(Hehe. She's let her guard down... Here I go!)

Huh? F-Fwhaaaa?! Wh-What are you doing,
darling?

Well, as I was looking at your neck, Miku,
I got the thought that it might smell nice.

H-H-Hey, you mustn't. Suddenly smelling
someone like that.

Hm. It must be your shampoo. It smells really
sweet, and your hair is so soft...
Fwaaaah!! P-Please stop～!!

(Surprisingly, she was flustered to an amusing
degree. Actually, I'm acting kinda perverted,
aren't I?)

Sorry, sorry. I just wanted to tease you a
little.

To smell a woman's hair without asking...
You mustn't do this ever again, okay?
I mean it, I'm sorry. Please forgive me.

Goodness. I love you, so it can't be helped.
Next time, be sure to ask first. If it's you,
darling, I don't mind.

(Er, no, I didn't mean it like that. Well, if
Miku's fine with it, then I guess it's okay.)

(Miku's totally open right now. I know, I need
to teach her a lesson! Sure, it sounds selfish,
but I'm sure it'll be fine.)

Okay then, Miku. We'll keep going.
If it hurts... I'll stop, so just say so, okay?
All right. I understand. Please go ahead.

(Hehehehe. She's totally let her guard down.
Here we go, Miku!)
Then... I'll do this!

(Over the entirety of the human body, the
spots that are most ticklish are... places where
the skin is thinnest! First, her armpit!)

Huh, what...? Ah, hee hee, ahahaha!
H-Hey, darling, don't!

Hmm. I can't hear you. What's the matter,
Miku?
Th-This isn't a massage... Th-This isn't good!

Hmm? Did I hear you say you want me to
keep going?

(Looks like she's super ticklish. Then, time to
tickle her neck! It's one of the most sensitive
parts on the body.)
Well, it's cliché, but here!

Kyaa! Y-You can't do that! D-Darling, please,
have mercy!

Hehe, what to do? You just said you wanted
me to keep going, after all.
Y-You can't be serious!
Perhaps a little longer will do...

(Oh, shoot. Kotori's here. Talk about awkward.
Miku and I fell suddenly silent.)
D-Did she hear us?
Ummm, I'm not sure.

(We were only fooling around for a bit, but
I'm starting to feel totally embarrassed. When
I realized, Miku and I sat further apart.)
Um, I'm sorry. Let's stop for today...
Y-Yes... It felt good...

(Even in our embarrassment, we both
exchanged sly smiles.)
How do you feel? Any more relaxed?
Yes. Much better, thanks to you, darling.

Gotcha. If you ever need me, you know where
to find me. It's nice to be needed now and then.
Yes, thank you～

(Perhaps Miku's words were heartfelt, as she
was blushing. Either way, I'm happy she enjoyed
it.)
